product_name: CliniqueAcne Solutions Cleansing Foam Face Wash Mini
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingHSA/FSA eligibleClinique Acne Solutions Cleansing Foam Face Wash is a daily medicated cleanser powered by 1.5% salicylic acid. Helps clear and prevent acne, and unclog pores. Now in a mini travel size.
details: DetailsBenefitsFormulated for acne-prone skins.Daily medicated face cleanser with 1.5% salicylic acid removes dirt and excess oil.Helps keep pores clear for healthier-looking skin.Paraben-free. Phthalate-free.Oil-free. Non-acnegenic.Denatured alcohol.Synthetic colors.SLS-free. SLES-free. Gluten-free.Allergy tested. Fragrance free.Dermatologist tested.For best results, use the Clinique Acne Solutions Clear Skin System consistently to help get breakouts under control: cleanse with Cleansing Foam or Cleansing Gel, exfoliate with Clarifying Lotion, and treat with Clinical Clearing Gel.Key IngredientsSalicylic acid and acetyl glucosamine help clear dead skin cells that can contribute to clogged pores.Laminaria saccharina extract helps prevent oil buildup that can lead to breakouts.Infused with caffeine, sucrose, sea whip extract, and kola nut extract.Item 2590262How To UseUse cleanser twice a day, morning and night.Pump 2-3 times.Massage gently over wet skin, avoiding eye area.Rinse thoroughly; pat skin dry.Follow with Acne Solutions Clarifying Lotion and Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel.After blemishes clear, continue using for preventive care.If dryness or peeling occur, reduce usage.IngredientsSalicylic Acid 1.5%, Water\\Aqua\\Eau, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Sodium Methyl Cocoyl Taurate, Sucrose, Disodium Phosphate, Arginine Cocoate, Laminaria Saccharina Extract, Caffeine, Algae Extract, Cola Acuminata (Kola) Seed Extract, Sea Whip Extract, Peg/Ppg-18/18 Dimethicone, Sodium Hyaluronate, Ppg-6-Decyltetradeceth-30, Lactobacillus Ferment, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Acetyl Glucosamine, Capryloyl Glycine, 10-Hydroxydecanoic Acid, Polyquaternium-7, Phospholipids, Stearic Acid, Sodium Hydroxide, Disodium Edta, Phenoxyethanol, Chloroxylenol \ Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Use cleanser twice a day, morning and night.Pump 2-3 times.Massage gently over wet skin, avoiding eye area.Rinse thoroughly; pat skin dry.Follow with Acne Solutions Clarifying Lotion and Dramatically Different Moisturizing Gel.After blemishes clear, continue using for preventive care.If dryness or peeling occur, reduce usage.
ingredients: Chloroxylenol \ Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: Keeps break outs away!

reviews.headline: Holy grail
reviews.comments: I've been searching FOR YEARS for something that would help my break outs. I've spent thousands of dollars trying to clear my acne. This has cleared my skin and isn't drying. My skin is oily, sensitive, and acne prone. If you havent tried it, you need to!!

reviews.headline: Nice
reviews.comments: Suits my skin . Very light and foamy

reviews.headline: BEST THING EVER
reviews.comments: I've always had these bumps on my nose that would never go away for years I tried to get rid them but nothing worked until I tried this. I haven't felt normal skin in years until today!!

reviews.headline: BEST THING EVER
reviews.comments: I've always had these bumps on my nose that would never go away for years I tried to get rid them but nothing worked until I tried this. I haven't felt normal skin in years until today!!

reviews.headline: Clinique Acne Cleanser
reviews.comments: This is a great facial cleanser! My skin feels so good after using it! I would definitely recommend!

reviews.headline: Breakouts are worse than before
reviews.comments: I was hoping this would work for me however it broke my skin out even worse than before

reviews.headline: Breakouts are worse than before
reviews.comments: I was hoping this would work for me however it broke my skin out even worse than before

reviews.headline: My Everyday Face Wash
reviews.comments: I've been consistently using this face cleanser for years now and it has really helped treat my acne. The foam is gentle on my sensitive skin. I recommend pairing this with the clarifying lotion and acne treatment from Clinique.

reviews.headline: Great for acne
reviews.comments: This product is great for anyone with acne to any degree. It helps to dry up all the blemishes. And it doesn't overdry the skin in the meantime.

reviews.headline: Replacement for face & body bar
reviews.comments: This is the perfect replacement for the face & body acne solutions bar. I have only used it for less than one week and my dark spots are already disappearing. I have found my solution to prevent new acne pimples while also clearing old acne marks!

reviews.headline: I've struggled with acne for YEARS
reviews.comments:
I first started getting acne when i was in 6th grade and continued to struggle with it as an adult. As you can imagine i tried what felt like everything short of a dermatologist since it was out of my price range. After moving across country from dry heat to humidity my skin didnt take it well and i continously broke out. I have sensitive combination skin and tried this product a couple months back, my skin hasnt been this clear since i was a child and im absolutely ESTATIC about it. Id definitely recommend to at least try it, it hasnt helped with the acne scars yet (if it even does) but its cleared out the ance to the point where i can start to focus on getting the scars corrected 

Short summary: at least try it, in my experience it works!

reviews.headline: Been using it for 12 years now
reviews.comments: I started using this product at 22 and at 34 I continue to use it twice daily. It's the only thing that consistently keeps my acne controlled (why do I still have acne lol). It's amazing and I can't live without it.

reviews.headline: So far so hood
reviews.comments: Hasn't made anything worse yet but hasn't completely cleared either.

reviews.headline: AMAZING!!!!
reviews.comments: Ok so I've never wrote reviews about any products like ever but for this particular one i just had too!! Ive always had clear skin but lately i been battling with hormonal cystic acne like crazy all over my face i been through every face wash and nothing was helping at all, until i came across the clinique acne solutions foam wash, OMG LET ME TELL YOU IT CLEARED UP MY SKIN SO FAST WITH JUST 2 washes like wow i was so amazed by it!! I have 2 acne scars on my cheek and their going away as well they lightened up so much! I will continue to buy this face wash from now on and I especially love that it doesnt dry my skin out at all its so gentle yet effective in a good way!! Please please dont ever change the formula on this face wash!!

reviews.headline: Perfect
reviews.comments: I have normal skin, neither oily nor dry. I used this Acne cleanser with the rest of this line with an addition cucumber Sunscreen. I used these for 6 months and my skin is the BEST it has EVER been!

reviews.headline: Has helped my acne
reviews.comments: I have post menopausal cystic acne. It is stubborn, but I believe this product has helped to calm it down some. I've been using it for 3 months twice daily. It does dry my skin out some but I will take it over my oily combination skin.

reviews.headline: Cleansing
reviews.comments: I really enjoy this foam wash, it's really cleansing & lathers really well. I've been using it for about a 2 weeks & have already seen improvement

reviews.headline: I loved it
reviews.comments: It's light, but removes all makeup after cleaning my face with micellar water. And i don't feel dryness and any excess oil on my face

reviews.headline: Helped with my acne
reviews.comments: It helped a lot with my acne and it did dry out my skin a little but I also got the moisturizer and so then my skin was super soft and it cleared some of my acne within a week

media.headline: After years of bad adult acne this is actually working
media.caption: This is just 6 days of using product. Have not grown a new pimple since using this product. Huge improvement.

media.headline: Im so dissapointed in the result.
media.caption: Dissapointed in result

faceoff_positive.comments: I am hooked on this cleansing foam. The light fragrance is fresh and refreshing and it rinses off easily leaving my skin looking and feeling so much better! I ran out over the weekend and went back to an old cleanser I had and my skin hated me for it! I was buying more Clinique cleanser first thing Monday morning!
faceoff_positive.headline: Can't Live Without It!

faceoff_negative.comments: Has a light and refreshing fragrance and really makes your face feel clean. It also has salicylic acid in it as opposed to benzoyl peroxide which is a lot more harsh on the skin in my opinion and also increases your skin's sensitivity to sunlight. This stuff helped cut back on my oiliness but in the long run it ended up leaving my face too dry and tight (especially after using the toner). I have combo dry/combo oily skin (depending on the season) if that helps. Overall a really nice cleanser, just not for me!
